mapper.sql: id, realname, username, password, department, enabled, isshow
mapper.select: SELECT concat('dept', CONV(`id`, 10, 10)) AS id, concat('dept', CONV(`parentDepId`, 10, 10)) AS pId, `name`, `name` as text, '1' AS isdept, IF (`id` = 1 OR `id` = 2, 'true', 'false') AS open FROM `tb_department` UNION SELECT CONV(`id`, 10, 10) AS id, concat('dept', CONV(`department`, 10, 10)) AS pId, `realname` AS name, `realname` AS text, '0' AS isdept, 'false' AS open FROM `tb_employee` WHERE `isshow` = 1
